name: Barricade
body:
# Barricade

Barricade is an ExpressionEngine 2.x addon that checks all new member registrations against the [StopForumSpam](http://stopforumspam.com) database.

## Installation

Move the barricade folder into your system/expressionengine/third_party folder and enable the extension. No other configuration is required.
tagline: An ExpressionEngine 2.x addon to test member registrations against the Stop Forum Spam database
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
